subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The 1968 Detroit Tigers, with Al Kaline, Willie Horton and Mickey Lolich, was expected to win a year after coming close. But this team of 2006 Tigers is something quite different.
snippet: The 1968 Detroit Tigers, with Al Kaline, Willie Horton and Mickey Lolich, was expected to win a year after coming close. But this team of 2006 Tigers is something quite different.
